headline: Oxy’s Non-Oil, Gas Projects to Add $1B in Free Cash Flow
summary: Occidental Petroleum’s cash flow improvements are expected as spending falls for projects, such as 1PointFive’s Stratos direct air capture, which will augment its ongoing oil and gas efficiency improvements.
